After jumping into the air, the [[ninken]] attack the enemy from a circular formation reminiscent of a [[Wikipedia:Crane (bird)|crane's wings]]. After surrounding the opponent(s), the hounds then bite the target's limbs rendering them unable to react as they plummet to the ground.
